title: Top 9.5 Things Make a BETTER Worm Farmer

tasks.task: Manage African Nightcrawlers in worm bins.
subtasks: Add varied food sources (meat, veggies, paper, manure).
Consider bin depth for meat feeding.
Address moisture needs during absentee care.
Track decomposition times for specific foods.
Address escape prevention for certain worm species.
Balance personal/family commitments with channel maintenance.
Engage with audience through comments and subscriptions.
